original_text: Listen to these rules and be careful to obey them. If you do that, the Lord your God will be faithful to the covenant that he has made with you. He promised your ancestors that he would do this.
korean_text: 너희가 이 모든 법도를 듣고 지켜 행하면 네 하나님 여호와께서 네 조상들에게 맹세하신 언약을 지켜 네게 인애를 베푸실 것이라

sentences.original_text: and be careful to obey them.
the Lord your God will be faithful to the covenant
sentences.korean_translation: 주 너희 하나님은 그 언약에 신실하실 것이다

sentences.original_text: that he has made with you.
